hero.title: Meet Jeonghamsu
hero.subtitle: Your Helpful AI Assistant
hero.description: Jeonghamsu is a friendly AI chatbot designed and developed by the Department of Information Security Cryptography and Mathematics to assist students with course or school-related questions, scheduling, campus information, and administrative processes.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide immediate, helpful, and personalized assistance to students, making school life easier by offering quick answers to everyday questions about campus services, events, and administrative procedures.

language-support.title: Language Support
language-support.content: Jeonghamsu supports multiple languages. Select your preferred language below.

item-1.title: Campus Navigation
item-1.description: Information about building locations, office hours, and campus facilities.

item-2.title: Administrative Support
item-2.description: Guidance on registration processes, form submissions, and document requirements.

item-3.title: Event Information
item-3.description: Updates on school events, club activities, and important dates.

item-4.title: FAQ Assistant
item-4.description: Answers to commonly asked questions about school policies and procedures.

item-5.title: Resource Locator
item-5.description: Help finding the right department, service, or person to contact for specific needs.

impact.title: School Impact
impact.content: Since its implementation, Jeonghamsu has significantly improved student experience by reducing wait times for information, providing 24/7 support for common questions, and helping students navigate campus life more efficiently.

development.title: Continuous Improvement
development.content: Jeonghamsu is constantly learning from interactions, expanding its knowledge of school resources, and refining its capabilities to better serve the evolving needs of our student community.

contact.title: Access Jeonghamsu
contact.content: Students can access Jeonghamsu through the school portal, mobile application, or dedicated kiosks located throughout campus buildings.
